Notes.Text:
This update for nodejs14 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-32212: Fixed DNS rebinding in --inspect via invalid IP addresses (bsc#1201328).
- CVE-2022-32213: Fixed HTTP request smuggling due to flawed parsing of Transfer-Encoding (bsc#1201325).
- CVE-2022-32214: Fixed HTTP request smuggling due to improper delimiting of header fields (bsc#1201326).
- CVE-2022-32215: Fixed HTTP request smuggling due to incorrect parsing of multi-line Transfer-Encoding (bsc#1201327).Â²
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in Node.js versions <14.20.0, <16.20.0, <18.5.0 due to an insufficient IsAllowedHost check that can easily be bypassed because IsIPAddress does not properly check if an IP address is invalid before making DBS requests allowing rebinding attacks.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-devel-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-docs-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:npm14-14.20.0-6.31.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module in Node.js does not correctly parse and validate Transfer-Encoding headers and can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-devel-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-docs-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:npm14-14.20.0-6.31.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module in Node.js does not strictly use the CRLF sequence to delimit HTTP requests. This can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-devel-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:nodejs14-docs-14.20.0-6.31.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Web and Scripting 12:npm14-14.20.0-6.31.1

Vulnerabilities.Description: The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module in Node.js does not correctly handle multi-line Transfer-Encoding headers. This can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).
